name: Enter Password (piskopat39)
description:
You don't know your password and the letters are running away from you!

Chase the letters of your password into their box and try to login.

You can move with W A S D keys.

Once you have all the keys of the password in the box, click the right arrow button.

This game was made solely by me for the Bogazici Game Jam 22 in 48 hours.

All assets used in the game were made during the jam.

Thanks for playing!

My discord : piskopat39#2911
